title: Got Queue Abandonment for the Client Crashing...
body: I got an abandonment timer even though the game client itself crashed, I didn't leave the queue.

replies.body:
Leaving or crashing during champion select can result in a [Queue Dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty.  The penalty treats everyone equally because it can cause a negative experience for other players even if it's not intentional.  If your game is crashing or  giving you bugsplat errors, then you may have a hardware or software issue improperly rendering game files.  My recommendation would be to run through [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide, which include steps as simple as updating your graphics driver or running a repair. 

 Hopefully, this will get your issue resolved but if it persists please let me know along with any additional information such as error messages you may be receiving.

why cant we have a pause feature?if someone leaves we can pause the game.
(its not realy rational giving fb then leaving the game because you have to restart your pc)

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
